name: Learning Mindset Inventory
description: Evaluates growth vs. fixed mindset orientation, resilience, and attitudes toward learning challenges.

items.stem: You can always change your basic intelligence level substantially.
No matter how hard you try, you can't really change your basic abilities.
When I fail at something, I tend to give up quickly.
When facing a difficult learning challenge, I typically:
options: Try once and move on if it's hard
Seek help and persist until I understand

items.stem: Making mistakes is an essential part of learning.
